description:
Knock.. Knock.. Knock..

"Jane..."

Jane ? Who's Jane ?

Summary : Praew, a high school girl who lived in a rental room alone, slept during working. But, the knock sound woke her up during midnight, on 00.15 AM.

General :

Title - 00.15

Version - 1.00

Author - Demonking

Tool - Wolf RPG Editor

Genre - Exploration, Horror

Language - Thai,Eng
